author: remm
msg: - Adds Cygwin fliendlyness to the Unix build script.

author: craigmcc
msg: Enforce the Servlet API contract for SingleThreadModel that says only one
request at a time is allowed inside the service() method.  This got broken
when the filtering model was re-implemented to match the changes in

author: craigmcc
msg: Ensure that the default host name is mapped to lower case, so that matches
against the actual host name will work correctly.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct a regression that was caused by a bug fix for multiple session ID
cookies.  The first session ID cookie was getting recognized, but any
other cookies set on the same "Cookie" header were getting ignored.
Among other things, this broke support for single sign on.
